org.lightningj.lnd.watchtower.proto

Interface WatchtowerGrpc.AsyncService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    WatchtowerGrpc.WatchtowerImplBase
    Enclosing class:
    WatchtowerGrpc

    public static interface WatchtowerGrpc.AsyncService
     Watchtower is a service that grants access to the watchtower server
 functionality of the daemon.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      default void getInfo(WatchtowerOuterClass.GetInfoRequest request, io.grpc.stub.StreamObserver<WatchtowerOuterClass.GetInfoResponse> responseObserver)
      lncli: tower info GetInfo returns general information concerning the companion watchtower including its public key and URIs where the server is currently listening for clients.

    • Method Detail

      • getInfo

        default void getInfo(WatchtowerOuterClass.GetInfoRequest request,
                     io.grpc.stub.StreamObserver<WatchtowerOuterClass.GetInfoResponse> responseObserver)
         lncli: tower info
GetInfo returns general information concerning the companion watchtower
including its public key and URIs where the server is currently
listening for clients.
